title: Wall Street Breakfast August 17: What Moved Markets This Week
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Stocks wrapped up their most volatile week this year with a broad-based rally, as a rebound in bond yields eased fears of a recession that had caused such consternation earlier this week. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
